scammer_stories.title: Vanish at Midnight
scammer_stories.body: Russ posted a goodbye at 02:14 and then deleted his entire profile. Small transfers appeared to cold wallets shortly after.

scammer_stories.title: Moderator in Pocket
scammer_stories.body: A moderator who defended the team had off-chain chats with several whales. Receipts surfaced later.
